owner.find-employee-desc:
Sign up super fast & for free.

Swipe through employee profiles near you & get in touch with one click.
owner.quickly-desc:
This is exactly why we developed the List View for you.

Simply scroll through the employee list, always keep an overview and save even more time.
owner.as-fast-short:
Finally find the employees

who really suit you.
owner.as-fast-desc: With our filter function, you can immediately find the employees who perfectly suit you and your company .

search-user-title: The fastest way to find the best jobs.
search-user-subtitle-waitress: In which city would you like to work?
search-user-subtitle-owner: In which city do you want to find staff?

lifetime-member:
...that you will remember

for a lifetime.
landing-title:
The job search

platform in the world.
try-now-title:
Try the fastest job app now.

For you free forever.
animation-waitress-title1: Find the coolest gastro jobs in 60 seconds
animation-waitress-text1:
Sign up super fast and get an hourly wage of €16 + benefits.

Use all features completely free, forever!
animation-waitress-title2:
As quick & easy as

never before!
animation-waitress-text2:
Swipe from job to job & post your best

jobs with just one click.
animation-waitress-title3: KELLNEROO® is exactly what you are looking for!
animation-waitress-text3:
For gastro newcomers, career changers, professionals. For all.

Seasonal work, student job, mini job, part-time or full-time.

At KELLNEROO® only people count, not their past. All you need is motivation.
animation-waitress-text4: KELLNEROO® abolishes the paper application in the gastro! Say goodbye to: CVs & cover letters. Say YES! to: Online wage negotiations & quick trial work appointments.

pricing.label: Our pricing model
pricing.title: From the gastro - for the gastro. Just fair.
pricing.text: KELLNEROO® provides new job seekers every week. It's up to you. The longer you stay with us, the more staff we can offer you.

unlimited.billing-desc: View all employee profiles, all visitors to your jobs & chat with them.

premium.billing-desc: See a total of 50 employee profiles from the immediate vicinity & your last 10 profile visitors.

card-content: Chat to any number of employees & arrange one trial work date.
